about_the_game:
Year 2 Season Pass now available!
Pre-Purchase Farming Simulator 22's DLCs to be released in its 2nd year:
- Volvo LM 845
- Farming Simulator 22: Göweil Pack
- Farming Simulator 22: Hay & Forage Pack
- Farming Simulator 22: Horsch Agrovation Pack
- Farming Simulator 22: Oxbo Pack
- Farming Simulator 22: Premium Expansion (Q4 2023)
Save over 30%!

Year 2 Season Pass now available!
Pre-Purchase Farming Simulator 22's DLCs to be released in its 2nd year:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon R9 390X (8 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1060 (6 GB) / Radeon RX 570 (8 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
